Grouped_Utterances: I felt happy. It was nice to just relax and connect without any distractions. They’re going well! I’m learning a lot, but it can be overwhelming with everything else.
I’ve been thinking about my relationship with my son. I want to make sure I’m being a good role model for him too.
I’ve been trying to stick to a routine like we discussed. It’s been better! I feel more rested, and I’m not as irritable during the day.

Hi Ellie! Things have been pretty busy, but I managed to take my daughter to the park like we talked about. It was really nice. We had a picnic, and we talked a lot. I think she really appreciated it. I’ve been trying to set aside specific times for studying, but sometimes I get sidetracked.
Yes, she opened up more. I think she liked that I was listening instead of just giving advice.

I’d like to keep having those outings. Maybe we can do something different next time. Maybe a movie night or going to a museum. She loves learning new things. That could help. I’ll try to be more structured with my time. I haven’t thought about that. I guess I could connect with some of them. I think I might add some light stretching or breathing exercises before bed. I’m excited to try it. I think it could help me relax even more. I want to show him the importance of hard work and kindness. I don’t want him to feel the pressure I sometimes do. I guess by showing him how I handle challenges and encouraging him to be kind to others. I think that’s a good idea. I’ll look for opportunities to talk to him about it.
